name: Stranger (itch) (TheOmegaWeeb)
description:
Put on your mask.

We all wear them.

You will wear many as you traverse through locked rooms, using your strangers in order to get out, and gain new masks; new strangers.

Put on your mask.

Each stranger has a different behavior, and a different look, which adds further wrinkles to your strategy.

But, be careful. If a stranger sees you, it's all over.

Put on your mask.

Put on your mask.

Put on your mask.
